text: Håkan Winberg (born 30 July 1931) is a Swedish politician. He served as a member of the Riksdag from 1971 to 1982 for the Moderate Party. He was also Minister of Justice from 1979 to 1981.http://runeberg.org/vemardet/1993/1195.html ==References== Category:Members of the Riksdag Category:Moderate Party politicians Category:Living people Category:1931 births
title: Håkan Winberg
